years.title: How it all started
years.description: My programming journey began in 2020 by watching a Node.js crash course on YouTube by The Coding Train. This course covered the basic JavaScript functions, and stuff you can do with it. I started my self-taugh journey right after watching this course, GitHub and StackOverflow were my "best friends".

years.title: Things get pretty
years.description: Finally, after a "long" time, I got into programming really well. I thought: "Can I do programming for a living?", and here I am, a professional backend developer aiming to become a full-stack developer. I also am working as a Developer at a company.
